text: Chisimu awala waakunkana Allah ni achimitenga Wakwe, ni kusakaga ali nkulekanganya chilikati cha Allah ni achimitenga Wakwe, nikuwechetaga (yanti): “Wane tukwakulupilila nambo wane tukwakana,” ni kusakaga kujigala litala lya chilikati cha yalakweyi (ngawa lya Usilamu usyesyene kapena lya ukafili)
